ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Red XIII}
“Don't worry about me.
I've seen it many times.”{PAUSE}“I haven't been back for a while…
Let me rest for a bit.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Red XIII}
“Sorry…I'm really sorry.
But now, I have…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Red XIII}
“…”{PAUSE}“…Don't worry.
Grandpa will come back floating,
saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:10}); // “It's Ho Ho Hoooo!
Ho Ho Hoooo!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // “He's finally come home, but
Bugenhagen doesn't seem well…”{PAUSE}“I want to hear Bugenhagen talk
with Nanaki like we used to do…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // “Nanaki, is it true that Bugenhagen
left on a journey?
Then that means he's better, right?
He IS going to come back soon, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // “Yea, that's right!
'Ho Ho Hoooo'!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // “He's finally come home, but
Bugenhagen doesn't seem well…”{PAUSE}“I want to hear Bugenhagen talk
with Nanaki like we used to do…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // “He's finally come home, but
Bugenhagen doesn't seem well…”{PAUSE}“I want to hear Bugenhagen talk
with Nanaki like we used to do…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // “That Nanaki's slick! He said,
'I'll protect this canyon'! But he didn't.
Forget about Nanaki.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // “Both Nanaki and Bugenhagen are gone…
I feel so lonely…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // “It's not that I'm afraid of that
big star.”{PAUSE}“It's just that, uh, I have a stomach ache…
That's why I'm not moving.
That's the truth!”

dialogStrings:
{Red XIII}
“Don't worry about me.
I've seen it many times.”{PAUSE}“I haven't been back for a while…
Let me rest for a bit.”

“It's not that I'm afraid of that
big star.”{PAUSE}“It's just that, uh, I have a stomach ache…
That's why I'm not moving.
That's the truth!”

“Both Nanaki and Bugenhagen are gone…
I feel so lonely…”

“That Nanaki's slick! He said,
'I'll protect this canyon'! But he didn't.
Forget about Nanaki.”

{Red XIII}
“Sorry…I'm really sorry.
But now, I have…”

“He's finally come home, but
Bugenhagen doesn't seem well…”{PAUSE}“I want to hear Bugenhagen talk
with Nanaki like we used to do…”

“Nanaki, is it true that Bugenhagen
left on a journey?
Then that means he's better, right?
He IS going to come back soon, right?”

{Red XIII}
“…”{PAUSE}“…Don't worry.
Grandpa will come back floating,
saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again…”

“It's Ho Ho Hoooo!
Ho Ho Hoooo!”
